009package Ch21_Geometric_Operations;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.gui.ImageCanvas;
015import ij.gui.Overlay;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.nonlinear.LogPolarMapping2;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
025import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
026import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
027
028import java.awt.Shape;
029import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;
030import java.awt.event.MouseListener;
031import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
032
033import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
034
035/**
036 * <p>
037 * ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of 2D log-polar mapping. Two mapping types are available (Version1, Version2).
038 * See Sec. 21.1.6 of [1] for details and examples. The plugin works interactively. Once started, the current mouse
039 * position specifies the transformation's center point. A new image with radius/angle coordinates is opened and
040 * continuously updated, until the plugin is terminated. The circular source grid is displayed as a graphic overlay.
041 * </p>
042 * <p>
043 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
044 * (2022).
045 * </p>
046 *
047 * @author WB
048 * @version 2022/11/16
049 * @see LogPolarMapping2
050 */
051public class Map_LogPolar_Demo implements PlugInFilter, MouseListener {
052        
053        private static int P = 60;              // number of radial steps
054        private static int Q = 100;             // number of angular steps
055        private double rmin, rmax;              // min/max radius (determined from image size)
056        
057        private static boolean ShowSamplingGrid = true; 
058        private static BasicAwtColor OverlayColorChoice = BasicAwtColor.Green;
059        private static float OverlayStrokeWidth = 0.2f;
060        
061        private ImagePlus sourceIm;
062        private ImageCanvas sourceCv;
063        private ImageProcessor sourceIp;
064        private ImageProcessor targetIp;
065        private ImagePlus targetIm;     
066        private Mapping2D mapping;
067        private String title;
068
069        /**
070         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
071         */
072        public Map_LogPolar_Demo() {
073                if (noCurrentImage()) {
074                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Flower);
075                }
076        }
077
078        @Override
079        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
080                this.sourceIm = im;
081                return DOES_ALL;
082        }
083        
084        @Override
085        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
086                rmax = Math.hypot(ip.getWidth(), ip.getHeight()) / 3;
087                rmin = rmax / 75;
088                
089                if (!getUserInput()) {
090                        return;
091                }
092                
093                this.sourceIp = ip;
094                this.targetIp = sourceIp.createProcessor(P, Q);
095                this.targetIm = new ImagePlus("Log Polar Image", targetIp);
096                this.sourceCv = sourceIm.getWindow().getCanvas();
097                this.sourceCv.addMouseListener(this);
098                //sourceCv.addMouseMotionListener(this);
099                this.sourceIm.setOverlay(null);
100                this.title = sourceIm.getTitle();
101                this.sourceIm.setTitle(title + " [RUNNING]");
102                this.sourceIm.updateAndRepaintWindow();
103                IJ.wait(100);
104        }
105        
106        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
107        
108        private void mapAndUpdate(double xc, double yc) {
109                this.mapping = new LogPolarMapping2(xc, yc, P, Q, rmax, rmin).getInverse();
110                new ImageMapper(mapping).map(sourceIp, targetIp);               
111                targetIm.show();
112                targetIm.updateAndDraw();
113                if (ShowSamplingGrid) {
114                        sourceIm.setOverlay(getSupportRegionOverlay(xc, yc));
115                        sourceIm.updateAndDraw();
116                }
117        }
118
119        void finish() {
120                sourceIm.setTitle(title);
121                sourceCv.removeMouseListener(this);
122        }
123        
124        // --------- generate source grid overlay ---------------
125        
126        private Overlay getSupportRegionOverlay(double xc, double yc) {
127                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
128                ColoredStroke stroke = new ColoredStroke(OverlayStrokeWidth, OverlayColorChoice.getColor());
129                ola.setStroke(stroke);
130                
131                for (int i = 0; i < P; i++) {
132                        ola.addShape(makeCircle(xc, yc, i));
133                }       
134                for (int j = 0; j < Q; j++) {
135                        ola.addShape(makeSpoke(xc, yc, j));
136                }
137                
138                return ola.getOverlay();
139        }
140        
141        
142        private Shape makeCircle(double xc, double yc, int i) {
143                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
144                Pnt2d start = mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.from(i, 0));
145                path.moveTo(start.getX(), start.getY());
146                for (int j = 1; j <= Q; j++) {
147                        Pnt2d pnt = mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.from(i, j % Q));
148                        path.lineTo(pnt.getX(), pnt.getY());
149                }
150                return path;
151        }
152        
153        private Shape makeSpoke(double xc, double yc, int j) {
154                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
155                Pnt2d outer = mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.from(P - 1, j));
156                Pnt2d inner = mapping.applyTo(Pnt2d.from(0, j));
157                path.moveTo(outer.getX(), outer.getY());
158                path.lineTo(inner.getX(), inner.getY());
159                return path;
160        }
161        
162        // --------- mouse event handling --------------------
163        
164        @Override
165        public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
166                if (e.isControlDown()) {
167                        finish();
168                }
169                else {
170                        double xc = sourceCv.offScreenXD(e.getX());
171                        double yc = sourceCv.offScreenYD(e.getY());
172                        //IJ.log("Mouse pressed: " + xc +","+yc);
173                        //IJ.log("Mag = " + canvas.getMagnification());
174                        mapAndUpdate(xc, yc);
175                }
176        }
177
178        @Override
179        public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent arg0) {}
180        @Override
181        public void mouseExited(MouseEvent arg0) {}
182        @Override
183        public void mousePressed(MouseEvent arg0) {}
184        @Override
185        public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent arg0) {}
186        
187        // ----------------------------------------------------
188        
189        boolean getUserInput() {
190                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
191                gd.addNumericField("Radial steps (P)", P, 0);
192                gd.addNumericField("Angular steps (Q) ", Q, 0);
193                gd.addNumericField("Max. radius (rmax)", rmax, 1);
194                gd.addNumericField("Min. radius (rmin)", rmin, 1);
195                gd.addCheckbox("Draw sampling grid", ShowSamplingGrid);
196                gd.addEnumChoice("Overlay color", OverlayColorChoice);
197                
198                gd.addMessage("Click left in source image to start,\n" +
199                                          "click ctrl+left to terminate.");
200                
201                gd.showDialog();
202                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
203                        return false;
204                }
205                
206                P = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
207                Q = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
208                rmax = gd.getNextNumber();
209                rmin = gd.getNextNumber();
210                ShowSamplingGrid = gd.getNextBoolean();
211                OverlayColorChoice = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
212                return true;
213        }
214}
